content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) used for smelting iron ore into iron-plate.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) used for smelting copper ore into copper-plate.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) with lab input {'automation-science-pack': 10}, status NO_POWER, researching automation (electrical_id: 29612).
- ElectricityGroup (id 29612) connecting small electric poles at positions (8.5, 6.5), (9.5, 6.5), (10.5, 7.5) with voltage 0.

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(-10.5, 18.5)
Consists of:
- Generator (steam engine) at position(-10.5, 18.5) for electricity production; warnings include "not connected to power network", "no input liquid", and "no fluid present in connections".
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) used for heating water; warning "out of fuel"; fluid box holds water (≈189.97 at temperature 15) with connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5), and steam output at (-7.5, 24.5); assigned fluid system [158907].
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) for water intake, status WORKING; fluid box holds water (≈99.25 at temperature 15) on fluid system [158907].
- Wooden chest at position(-4.5, 25.5) serving as the manual fuel feeding system.
- Pipeline Network consisting of:
   • PipeGroup at position(-5.5, 19.5) with fluid_system 158907, status WORKING.
   • PipeGroup at position(-2.5, 19.5) with fluid_system 158906, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(5.5, 21.5) with fluid_system 158919, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 23.5) with fluid_system 158918, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(-7.5, 25.5) with fluid_system 158914, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(0.5, 24.5) with fluid_system 158923, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 25.5) with fluid_system 158922, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 27.5) with fluid_system 158925, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(4.5, 27.5) with fluid_system 158926, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(-0.5, 28.5) with fluid_system 158927, status EMPTY.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• Fluid System Identifier Inconsistency:
   - Multiple connection attempts used varying fluid_system values [158243, 158327, 158409, 158493, 158575, 158659, 158741, 158825] near position (-5.5, 19.5) that did not yield any matching candidate pipe groups. Align connection attempts with the updated identifiers (e.g., 158907, 158906, etc.) used in the finalized pipeline network.

• Repeated Unsuccessful Candidate Searches:
   - Repeated searches within a 15-tile radius consistently returned 0 candidate pipe groups. Verify that spatial parameters and search radii correctly encompass the intended pipeline entities.

• Expected Candidate Not Found:
   - Connection attempts were aborted when no candidate pipe group with the specified fluid_system was found. Confirm that fluid system assignments and spatial configurations match the actual pipeline network setup before initiating connection operations.
